summary: Daily Progress Tracker App for tracking daily goals/tasks, progress analytics (daily/weekly/monthly), streaks, and optional reminders; includes authentication, task CRUD, dashboards/charts, and settings.
architectural_notes: Suggested stack: Flutter or React Native frontend with Firebase backend (Firestore).
Data model concept: users collection (name, email, createdAt) and tasks collection (userId, title, date, status, category).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal productivity app logo mark, warm neutral palette, flat vector style (daily-progress-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Simple empty-state illustration of a checklist and calendar on a desk, flat vector style (empty-tasks-illustration.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Implement user authentication using Internet Identity and gate all app features behind login.
Create user profile data linked to the authenticated Principal, including editable fields: display name and goal type (e.g., Study/Fitness/Coding/Other).
Implement task CRUD for the signed-in user: create task with title, date, status (done/pending), optional category, and optional notes; list tasks by selected date; edit and delete tasks.
Build progress analytics calculations and UI: daily completion percentage for the selected date; weekly summary; monthly summary; and total completed tasks.

Implement a streak system: current daily streak count, best streak record, and logic to break a streak when a day is missed (based on days with 100% completion or at least one completed task—choose one rule and apply consistently).

Create the required screens/routes with a user-friendly flow: Splash (or landing), Login/Register (Internet Identity sign-in), Home Dashboard, Add/Edit Task, Daily Progress view, Weekly/Monthly charts view, Profile/Settings.
Add dark/light mode support with a settings toggle and ensure the UI remains readable and consistent in both modes.
Implement export of the user’s task/progress data as a CSV download from the UI.
Add a simple motivational quotes feature: display an English quote on the dashboard (e.g., daily random from a built-in list) with an option to refresh.
Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) optimized for a clear, friendly productivity feel; avoid blue/purple as primary colors.

Render any generated static images (from imageRequirements.required) from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI (e.g., app logo in header/auth screens and an empty-state illustration when there are no tasks).

new_feature_requests.summary: User management: sign up/login (email+password and/or Google), user profile (name, goal type)
Daily task/goal tracker: add task with date, mark done/pending, edit/delete tasks
Progress tracking analytics: daily completion %, weekly/monthly summaries, total completed tasks
Streak system: current streak, best streak, break streak when a day is missed
Optional reminders: daily notification reminders with custom time setting
UI/screens: splash, auth (login/register), home dashboard, add task, daily progress view, weekly/monthly charts, profile/settings
Extra/resume features: dark/light mode, categories, notes per day, export progress (PDF/CSV), motivational quotes
